testcase.name: Check Received Ready Order Notification
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed And the user sees the "Assigned Orders List" list...........................passed And the status is " PREPARING"..............................................passed And the user waits "5" seconds..............................................passed When the user clicks on the "Menu" in the navbar............................passed And the user clicks on the "Available Orders" text in the Menu..............passed Then the order status switches to " READY TO CLAIM".........................passed And the user opens the notifications........................................passed And the user sees the "notification ready order" notification...............passed
